thread.title: BRIEF-Newfield Exploration Refinances Existing Revolving Credit Facility

title: BRIEF-Newfield Exploration Refinances Existing Revolving Credit Facility
text: 25 AM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Newfield Exploration Refinances Existing Revolving Credit Facility Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Newfield Exploration Co: * NEWFIELD EXPLORATION SAYS ON MARCH 23 REFINANCED EXISTING REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY BY ENTERING INTO REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY - SEC FILING * NEWFIELD EXPLORATION SAYS CREDIT AGREEMENT INCREASED AGGREGATE COMMITMENTS FROM $1.8 BILLION TO $2 BILLION * NEWFIELD EXPLORATION CO - CREDIT AGREEMENT EXTENDED MATURITY FROM JUNE 25, 2020 TO MAY 1, 2023 * NEWFIELD EXPLORATION - CREDIT AGREEMENT ADDED MECHANICS TO INCREASE COMMITMENTS SO LONG AS COMMITMENTS UNDER CREDIT FACILITY NOT EXCEED $2.75 BILLION Source text for Eikon: ( bit.ly/2pFNSYM ) Further company coverage:
